SEARCH

Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Main()
    Constructs an instance of the Main class, initializes stock items, and starts the interactive program for managing the grocery store.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addItemToCart()
    Adds an item to the shopping cart by taking user input for the item's ID and quantity.
    void
    addStockItem()
    Adds a new stock item to the inventory by taking user input for name, price, and quantity.
    void
    annachiKadai()
    The `annachiKadai` method serves as the main menu of the program, providing options for managing stock items, managing the shopping cart, or exiting the program.
    void
    decrementItemQuantity()
    Decrements the quantity of an item in the shopping cart by taking user input for item name and quantity to decrement.
    void
    exitProgram()
    Exits the program by closing the scanner and terminating the application.
    void
    incrementItemQuantity()
    Increments the quantity of an item in the shopping cart by taking user input for item name and quantity to increment.
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    The main method is the entry point for the program and creates an instance of the Main class to start the grocery store management program.
    void
    manageShoppingCart()
    Manages the shopping cart by providing options for adding, incrementing, decrementing, viewing, calculating total cost, and printing the bill for items in the cart.
    void
    manageStockItems()
    Manages the stock items by providing options for adding, updating, and viewing stock items.
    void
    StockWithGroceryItems()
    Initializes the stock with some sample grocery items.
    void
    updateStockItem()
    Updates an existing stock item's price and quantity by taking user input.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Main

      public Main()
      Constructs an instance of the Main class, initializes stock items, and starts the interactive program for managing the grocery store.

  • Method Details

    • StockWithGroceryItems

      public void StockWithGroceryItems()
      Initializes the stock with some sample grocery items.

    • manageStockItems

      public void manageStockItems()
      Manages the stock items by providing options for adding, updating, and viewing stock items.

    • addStockItem

      public void addStockItem()
      Adds a new stock item to the inventory by taking user input for name, price, and quantity.

    • updateStockItem

      public void updateStockItem()
      Updates an existing stock item's price and quantity by taking user input.

    • manageShoppingCart

      public void manageShoppingCart()
      Manages the shopping cart by providing options for adding, incrementing, decrementing, viewing, calculating total cost, and printing the bill for items in the cart.

    • addItemToCart

      public void addItemToCart()
      Adds an item to the shopping cart by taking user input for the item's ID and quantity.

    • incrementItemQuantity

      public void incrementItemQuantity()
      Increments the quantity of an item in the shopping cart by taking user input for item name and quantity to increment.

    • exitProgram

      public void exitProgram()
      Exits the program by closing the scanner and terminating the application.

    • decrementItemQuantity

      public void decrementItemQuantity()
      Decrements the quantity of an item in the shopping cart by taking user input for item name and quantity to decrement.

    • annachiKadai

      public void annachiKadai()
      The `annachiKadai` method serves as the main menu of the program, providing options for managing stock items, managing the shopping cart, or exiting the program. It runs in an infinite loop until the user chooses to exit.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method is the entry point for the program and creates an instance of the Main class to start the grocery store management program.
      Parameters:
      args - The command-line arguments (not used in this program).
